description.en: A Generative AI Leader is a visionary professional with comprehensive knowledge of how generative AI (gen AI) can transform businesses. They have business-level knowledge of Google Cloud's gen AI offerings and understand how Google's AI-first approach can lead organizations toward innovative and responsible AI adoption. They influence gen AI-powered initiatives and identify opportunities across business functions and industries, using Google Cloud's enterprise-ready offerings to accelerate innovation.
description.tw: 「生成式 AI 領導者」是一位具有前瞻思維的專業人士，他們深入了解生成式 AI ( gen AI ) 如何為企業帶來變革。他們不僅對 Google Cloud 的 gen AI 產品有商業層面的認識，更了解 Google 以 AI 為先的策略如何協助企業創新，並以負責任的方式導入 AI 技術。這些領導者能影響由 gen AI 驅動的各項計畫，並運用 Google Cloud 的企業級解決方案，在不同業務部門和產業中發掘機會，加速創新。

alt.en: Google Certified Generative AI Leader Badge
alt.tw: Google 認證「生成式 AI 領導者」徽章

alt.en: Google Certified Generative AI Leader Certificate
alt.tw: Google 認證「生成式 AI 領導者」證書
